Project Description
A Silverlight tag cloud control for your web site or blog.

More information about the evolution of the Silverlight TagCloud control as well as author discussion of its functionality can be found in this blog series.

This control is a tagcloud written in Silverlight. It looks like (minus the title and borders):



Some of the Silverlight TagCloud's key features include:
  • customization of background, tag item, and tag item hover color
  • auto-sizing based on tag and container content
  • integration with BlogEngine.NET
  • WCF service to retrieve tag items
  • deployment via user control
